name: The Influence Room
slogan: Private market place for brands and influencers to trade in mutual value
description: We are a giving brands the ability to apply this increasingly critical layer of advocacy to all their communications planning. The results of these connections range from brand awareness and reach through to direct ROI. The content created is significantly more engaging and the cost to create it, significantly cheaper.

jobs.title: Account Executive
jobs.description:
The Opportunity

The Account Executive will take the lead in prospecting and demonstrating The Influence Room solution to leading Brands. This is an opportunity for a highly intelligent, driven and energetic salesperson to play an impactful role in the success of a fast growing technology company. 

Core responsibilities will include:

•	Developing Brand pipeline, finding correct Company and Contact data 
to document in CRM
•	Prospecting Brands via email, phone, conferences and events 
•	Working with the Marketing team to optimise lead generation and marketing materials
•	Conducting discovery calls to understand potential customer needs
•	Tailoring virtual and in-person presentations of The Influence Room platform to potential customers
•	Negotiating and closing annual SaaS contracts with Brands to exceed individual and team Sales targets
•	Providing constant feedback to Sales Director to improve sales strategy, process and product offering
•	Working closely with the Account Management team to upsell existing customers
Previous experience using Hubspot will be an advantage.

What we offer: 

•	Competitive base salary and commission dependent upon experience 
•	Dynamic, fun working environment based in a co-working space in West London 
•	Opportunity to make a huge impact; accelerated career development and growth

jobs.title: Talent and Influencer Manager
jobs.description:
Welcome to the contra economy. The Influence Room is a members-only marketing platform connecting exclusive brands to talent and influencers.

In The Influence Room, brands swap experiences, campaigns and products for exposure from 'people of influence’ - generating authentic connections and advocacy.

We currently work with over 400 brands and our talent and influencer member base spans both on and offline media; from A-list talent whose media value may come in the form of a magazine interview, through to social media influencers whose content and audience sit online. Our members are what drives the culture of our business and therefore needs to be led by an excellent talent team. 

The Role

You will be working directly with the Head of Talent and be supported by a Talent Executive on building our exciting community of members across fashion, food, lifestyle, music, TV, radio, sport and business. The work is fast paced and exciting and you must have proven experience of building and nurturing strong relationships with VIP's, influencers and agents across sectors. We are looking for someone who can share knowledge and insights with the wider talent team on your talent and influencer network and how to utilize them. You must be confident in building strategic influencer and talent programmes, from creative ideation through to best practice activation and evaluation.

Requirements:

4-5+ years’ relevant experience in VIP, talent and influencer relations within the media industry.

Responsibilities:

- Supporting the Head of Talent to drive acquisition of new talent and influencers who meet The Influence Room requirements. 
- Maintain relationships and ensure users are satisfied with the platform.
- Support the Head of Talent on building a community around the platform through events, marketing and PR opportunities. 
- Proactively work on initiatives for talent referrals, drive word-of-mouth recommendations and introductions. 
- Support the Head of Talent on rolling out an advocate scheme and make sure the top users on the platform are nurtured and offered premium service.
- Identify key talent and influencer events throughout the year and attend where appropriate as a representative of The Influence Room to drive awareness.
- Manage and respond to feedback from talent and influencers. Communicate any findings to the wider business and facilitate more successful partnerships. 

Skills:

- Extensive experience working in the influencer/talent/VIP space as a manager or a strong Senior Account Executive to step up.
- Well-connected, with an impressive influencer network across diverse industry categories - fashion, food, entertainment, lifestyle, sport and business.
- Strategic approach to influencers with an understanding of brand partnerships and connectivity to social and measurement.
- A genuine interest in networking and excellent awareness of the cultural calendar that circles around talent and influencers
- Ideally a background in communications/PR/talent and influencer management 
- Ideally have good working relationships with brands and agencies (media, PR, creative) 
- Motivated self-starter with an entrepreneurial spirit
- Excellent organisational skills and ability to multi-task and manage multiple projects.
